statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{8.23}; top has length \displaystyle{11.71}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.45} and \displaystyle{11.35}. The height is \displaystyle{10.39}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{11.71}+{11.35}+{8.23}+{10.45}={41.74}.
